text: Santiago Auserón, also known as Juan Perro (July 25, 1954 in Zaragoza, Aragon) is a Spanish singer and lyricist. He was songwriter and vocalist of Spanish rock's Radio Futura. From 1972 to 1977 he attended the University of Madrid where he studied philosophy. After that he attended the University of Vincennes in Saint-Denis, where he stayed one year.Santiago Auserón, premio Nacional de Músicas Actuales In 1979, Auserón founded Radio Futura, being part of Madrilenian Scene ().Radio Futura: 1979-2004.
